carin-rtpbc-coverage-summary-value-set


Defining URL:http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/ValueSet/rtpbc-coverage-summary
Version:0.1.0
Name:CarinRtbpcCoverageSummaryValueSet
Status:Active
Title:CARIN RTPBC Coverage Summary Value Set
Definition:

This value set contains a set of coverage outcomes that may apply to a prescription product and pharmacy combination evaluated in the Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process.

Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle

This value set contains a set of coverage outcomes that may apply to a prescription product and pharmacy combination evaluated in the Real-time Pharmacy Benefit Check (RTPBC) process. In order to be meaningful to patients, this value set summarizes the range of coverage levels and restrictions into a smaller, more readily understandable group of values.



Used in...

  • CARIN RTPBC Response Using ClaimResponse

Expansion

This value set contains 6 concepts
